name: Chopendra
description: Just sounds funny. Once used in the movie called Bul Bul.
origin: Western regions of Nepal. Arghakhachi, Palpa

name: Hunjeu
description: The person used to always say: Hunn, Jiu! Jiu! during convertation. So people started calling him Hunjeu.

name: Ghanshingh
description: There was a lama(Jhakri) in a remote village of Palpa.Composed of: Ghan (Hmmer) + Shingh (Horn).

name: Ghan
description: Literal meaning of Ghan is Hammer.
